replies.body: I know you didn't but like I said, compared to us, you did, you were actually organized. I personally didn't find anything offensive but some people are pretty sensitive and you can hurt their feelings, especially when they get called out. I know it's all jokes and stuff but try to be more considerate if you're gonna upload it, it was a fun scrim regardless.
